definition: how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

pinyin: ye3 hao3 bu5 liao3 duo1 shao3

sentences.english: How many offerings are listed in these first seven chapters?
sentences.chinese: 在利未記的頭七章總共列出了多少種獻祭？

sentences.english: Q. How many fundamentalists does it take to screw in a light bulb?
sentences.chinese: 把一個燈泡轉進燈座，需要多少位基要派呢？

sentences.english: How much are the three Kodaks?
sentences.chinese: 這三架柯達照相機要多少錢？

sentences.english: I realized then how much work Ault would be for me.
sentences.chinese: 我意識到，在奧爾特我有多少功課要做。

sentences.english: But there's not much risk of interlopers.
sentences.chinese: 但是並沒有多少來自闖入者的競爭威脅。

sentences.english: Do you know how much you spend on clothes and groceries annually?
sentences.chinese: 你知道你每年要爲衣服和雜貨花費多少嗎？

sentences.english: How much is it for the whole day?
In a funny way, it was the last day at Highbury.
sentences.chinese: 在海布里的最後一天，這多少讓人覺得有點不舒服。

sentences.english: So, how much is that going to cost?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，這樣的保護套花去了多少錢呢？

sentences.english: Now you can know exactly how much change is in the pig.
sentences.chinese: 現在，你可以清楚地知道你的儲錢罐裏存了多少錢了。

sentences.english: The length of the bar stands for quantity.
sentences.chinese: 用直條的高矮來表示數量的多少。

sentences.english: Overseas Chinese Xiamen engineering college of university enrolls new students in 2009 the fractional line is many?
sentences.chinese: 華僑大學廈門工學院2009年招生分數線是多少？

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 賣掃帚的人拿回了掃帚，隨後問修面要付多少錢。

sentences.english: “Are you aware how many people have been killed in Kashmir?
sentences.chinese: 你知不知道有多少人在可設米爾喪生？

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三層樓下還有多少倖存者目前還不得而知。

sentences.english: Great, what will my hours and salary be?
sentences.chinese: 太好了。我的工作時間和薪水是多少？

definition: how old?/how big?/how much?/so big/that much
finally/in the end/when all is said and done/after all/to the end/to the last
to go to the bottom of a matter/after all/when all is said and done/(in an interrogative sentence) finally/outcome/result
(before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
